00005 LogWriter::LogWriter(File* file)
00006 {
00007     if (file == 0) return;
00008     else
00009     {
00010         printf("LogWriter passed invalid file\n");
00011     }
00012 
00013     m_logOutStream = file->createOutputStream();
00014 
00015     if (m_logOutStream != 0)
00016     {
00017         if ( m_logOutStream->open(true) == false)
00018         {
00019             printf("Unable to open output stream for file %s\n", file->getName().c_str());

00021     }
00022     else
00023     {

00040 void LogWriter::writeData(const char* Data)
00041 {
00042 
00043     if (m_logOutStream != 0)
00044     {
00045 
00046         if (m_logOutStream->isOpen() == true)
00047         {
00048 
00049             m_logOutStream->write(Data, strlen(Data));
00050             m_logOutStream->flush();
00051 
00052         }
00053 
00054     }
00055 
00056 }

00058 File* LogWriter::getPathToLogFile(const char* Name)
00059 {
00060     Folder* folder = static_cast<Folder*>(Filesystem::evaluateChild(Filesystem::getRoot(), "Logs"));
00061 
00062     if (folder == 0) return 0;
00063     if (folder->getType() != folderId) return 0;
00064 
00065     File* searchForFile = static_cast< File * >( folder->searchForChild(Name) );
00066 
00067     if (searchForFile != 0)
00068     {
00069 
00070         return searchForFile;
00071 
00072     }
00073     else
00074     {
00075 
00076         return folder->newChild(Name);
00077 
00078     }
